sourcesContent:
import { ref, onValue } from "firebase/database"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { database } from "../../config/Firebase/firebase"; // Sesuaikan jalur impor dengan struktur folder Anda const Topbar = () => { const [Info, setInfo] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const InfoRef = ref(database, "Info/"); // Gunakan instance database yang sudah diinisialisasi onValue(InfoRef, (snapshot) => { const data = snapshot.val(); setInfo(data); }); }, []); return (
{Info.alamat}
{Info.tanggal}
{Info.telepon}
); }; export default Topbar;
